options.content: SpaceBoard

targets.query: SELECT max("active_code") FROM "systemd_units" WHERE ("nb_role" = 'application'  AND ("name" = 'nginx.service' OR "name" = 'consul-template.service' OR "name" = 'consul.service')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(none) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT max("active_code") FROM "systemd_units" WHERE (("nb_role" = 'management' ) AND "name" = 'nginx.service' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(none) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(val) FROM (SELECT last(value) as val FROM "jvm_memory_heap_used-bytes" WHERE $timeFilter AND pu_name != '' GROUP BY "pu_instance_id")
SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_heap_used-bytes" WHERE  pu_name != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pu_name" fill(null)

SELECT SUM(val) FROM (select last(value) as val FROM "space_data_tiered-storage-disk-entries" WHERE  data_type_name != 'java.lang.Object' AND $timeFilter AND space_active = 'true' GROUP BY space_name,data_type_name, pu_instance_id) GROUP BY data_type_name, space_name
SELECT mean("value") FROM "os_cpu_used-percent" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("nb_role" = 'application') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "os_cpu_used-percent" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT last("DaemonThreadCount") FROM "kafka.thread_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "host" fill(0) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
